mapper.select: select R1.* from(select @rownum:=@rownum+1, A.* from tbl_board A, (select @rownum:=0) R order by idx desc) R1 limit #{pageNum}, #{amount}
select*from tbl_board where idx>0 order by regdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, writer=#{writer}, regdate=#{regdate} where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board where idx>0
mapper.update: update tbl_board set viewCnt=viewCnt+1 where idx=#{idx}
